channel.title: How do i make a standard npc dialog?
channel.description:
Well... I want to make a standard npc dialog on a Deltascape server.
This is what i would like..
Npc ("Hello there, What do you want")
Options ("Buy slayer exp", Never mind")
Npc ("Are you sure you want to buy 500k slayer exp for 100M?")
Options ("Yes", "No")
I also want it to write to character file so you can only get 500k slayer exp once
like
buyslayerexp = 0
And then after you buy it
buyslayerexp = 1 so you cant get it again....
Thanks.

item.title: How do i make a standard npc dialog?
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

I think that you are more then capable of using the search bar and finding it yourself. It is on the first or second page in the tutorial section.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a standard npc dialog?
